scripts.gas:release: cd apps-script && clasp push && clasp deploy -i AKfycbzN161iA01iTCi11_YcDQcJGWibX0ZzjGWfSibth9Vap4rueyewxwMIdhcEw3CDrlhI --description "Release"
scripts.gas:setup-sheets:web: sh -c 'test -n "$ADMIN_EMAIL" || { echo "Set ADMIN_EMAIL first"; exit 1; }; curl -s -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{\"action\":\"uk_setup_sheets\",\"email\":\"$ADMIN_EMAIL\"}" "https://script.google.com/macros/s/AKfycbzN161iA01iTCi11_YcDQcJGWibX0ZzjGWfSibth9Vap4rueyewxwMIdhcEw3CDrlhI/exec"'
